name: Age of the vampire: Love story
name_original: Age of the vampire: Love story
description:
Discover all the mystical secrets

Find your true love

Make choices that are closer to you

New episodes every month!

You will play as a character of the Victorian age. Mysticism and romanticism are everywhere. Palaces, dances, intrigues and love are already waiting for you. Choose own way and go through the entire story!

Download Now👇
